00011 #include "DdTimer.h"
00012 
00013 namespace DdMd
00014 {
00015 
00016    DdTimer::DdTimer(int size)
00017    {
00018       times_.allocate(size);
00019       size_ = size;
00020       clear();
00021    }
00022 
00023    DdTimer::~DdTimer()
00024    {}
00025 
00026    void DdTimer::clear()
00027    {
00028       for (int i = 0; i < size_; i++) {
00029          times_[i] = 0.0;
00030       }
00031    }
00032 
00033    void DdTimer::start()
00034    {
00035       clear();
00036       begin_ = MPI_Wtime(); 
00037       previous_ = begin_;
00038    }
00039 
00040    void DdTimer::stamp(int id)
00041    {
00042       double current = MPI_Wtime();
00043       times_[id] += current - previous_;
00044       previous_ = current;
00045    }
00046 
00047    void DdTimer::stop()
00048    {  time_ = MPI_Wtime() - begin_; }
00049 
00050    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00051    void DdTimer::reduce(MPI::Intracomm& communicator) 
00052    {
00053       int procs = communicator.Get_size();
00054       int rank  = communicator.Get_rank();
00055       bool isMaster = bool(rank == 0);
00056       double sum;
00057       for (int i = 0; i < size_; i++) {
00058          communicator.Reduce(&times_[i], &sum, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00059          if (isMaster) times_[i] = sum/double(procs);
00060       }
00061       communicator.Reduce(&time_, &sum, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00062       if (isMaster) time_ = sum/double(procs);
00063    }
00064    #endif
00065 
00066    double DdTimer::time(int id)
00067    {  return times_[id]; }
00068 
00069    double DdTimer::time()
00070    {  return time_; }
00071 
00072 }
00073 #endif
